meanings.definition: Relating to the detailed analysis of small-scale phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Her microanalytic approach to the experiment revealed hidden patterns.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a microanalytic method to study the tiny particles.
meanings.sent3: The detective's microanalytic skills helped uncover the tiniest clue.
meanings.sent4: His microanalytic vision allowed him to see the world in intricate detail.
meanings.sent5: The artist's microanalytic eye captured the smallest nuances in the painting.

meanings.definition: Involving the examination of minute details.
meanings.sent1: The microanalytic study focused on the smallest elements of the equation.
meanings.sent2: She had a microanalytic approach to analyzing the intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The chef's microanalytic taste buds could detect the tiniest flavors.
meanings.sent4: His microanalytic mind could grasp the subtlest connections.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler's microanalytic precision ensured every detail was perfect.
